name: Eye Can See You
description:
"Eye Can See You" is a mystery otome game about Aiya Yoshida, a girl who possesses an ancestral magic eye that allows her to see spirits.

She enters a new school and encounters spirits, who haunt their school on a daily basis. Each one with their own story regarding their life and death.

But soon she discovers that not all of them have good intentions...

  • Compelling story with paranormal elements such as yokai
  • Mythology and historical aspects
  • Great voice-over in Japanese
  • Three romance routes (?)
  • Multiple choices that may matter later on
  • Different personalities and personal growth for each character
  • Cute and original character art and aesthetics
Warning: Viewer discretion is advised.

Gameplay features the following:

  • Horror content such as blood and gore.
  • Heavy content such as suicide and violence.
  • Flashing images and mild jumpscares
